unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: none.

unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 2 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: none.

unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 2 wizard .Equipment: Hand weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: MR (1).

unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Ally (Norse Dwarf).

unit.description: Equipment: Additional hand weapons or great weapon. Special Rules: Ally (Norse Dwarf), Frenzy, Ward Save (6+), Berserker.

unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon, light armour and shield. Special Rules: Unruly, War Chant, Block (Shield).

unit.name: Spearman
unit.description: Equipment: Spear, light armour and shield. Special Rules: Unruly, War Chant, Anti-Cav (Spear).

unit.name: Huscarl
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon, light armour and shield. Special Rules: Unruly, War Chant, Block (Shield).

unit.name: Huscarl Guard
unit.description: Equipment: Spear, heavy armour and shield. Special Rules: Stubborn, Killing Blow, Bodyguard.

unit.name: Frost Wolf
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Expendable.

unit.name: Bondsman
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Expendable.

unit.description: Equipment: Bow. Special Rules: Light Infantry.

unit.name: Scout
unit.description: Equipment: Javelin. Special Rules: Skirmisher, Scout.

unit.name: Raider
unit.description: Equipment: Additional hand weapons. Special Rules: Unruly, Light Infantry, Slavers.

unit.description: Equipment: Additional hand weapons. Special Rules: Skirmisher, Frenzy, Ward Save (5+), Deathblow, Berserker.

unit.name: Horseman
unit.description: Mount: Warhorse. Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: Light Cavalry.

unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Unruly, Fear, Regenerartion (5+), Ignores Difficult Terrain.

unit.name: War Mammoth
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Large Target, Immune to Psychology, Scaly Skin (5+), Impact Hits (W3), Trample (W3).

unit.name: Frost Giant
unit.description: Equipment: Ice Weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Stubborn, Large Target, Immune to Psychology, Frost Aura.

unit.name: Norse Dwarf
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Ally (Norse Dwarf), Block (Shield), Relentless.

unit.name: Norse Dwarf Berserker
unit.description: Equipment: Additional hand weapons. Special Rules: Ally (Norse Dwarf), Frenzy, Light Infantry, Ward Save (6+), Berserker, Relentless.

equipment.name: Great weapons (in exchange for add. handw.)

unit.name: Norse Dwarf Quarreller
unit.description: Equipment: Crossbow and light armour. Special Rules: Ally (Norse Dwarf), Relentless.

mount.name: Warhorse
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: none.

item.name: Ambush
Ambush special rule (not more units than core units!)
item.description: Units with the Ambush special rule may start the game in reserve. Beginning with turn 2, roll a d6 at the start of your turn for each unit in reserve: on a 4+ the unit may enter the battlefield from any board edge (as if it has left the board in a previous turn due to a pursuit), add +1 to the roll for each turn after the second, a natural 1 always fails.

item.name: Armour of the Forefathers
Armour o.t. Foref.
item.description: Heavy armour. The strength of hits the bearer suffers is reduced by 1.

item.name: Banner of Battle Lust
item.description: The unit gains +1M and does not suffer movement penalties for difficult terrain.In addition friendly units within 12" are allowed to march even when an enemy unit is within march blocking range (usually within 8").

item.name: Banner of the Cold Country
item.description: Units shooting at this model and his unit suffer -1BS (to a minimum of 0) for this attack.

item.name: Banner of the Wild Hunt
item.description: +D3" charge range

item.name: Banner of the Wild Northmen
item.description: Bearer and unit always counts as outnumbering in cc.

item.name: Battle Axe of Jarl Sigurd the Great
Battle Axe of Jarl Sigurd
item.description: Great weapon. Each wound inflicted counts as 2CR.

item.name: Bear Paw
item.description: +1 to cast spells (PM and BM)

item.name: Bearserker Axes
item.description: Counts as additional hand weapons. The bearer gains Frenzy.

item.name: Beastmaster
item.description: The unit may include one Beastmaster that counts as the unit Champion. (The Beastmaster does NOT replace a Frost Wolf.)

item.name: Berserker
item.description: Only characters with the "Berserker" special rule can join units with the "Berserker" special rule. Characters with the "Berserker" special rule can only join units with the "Berserker" special rule.

item.name: Blessing of the Cold Gods (6+)
Blessing o.t. Cold Gods PM3/6+
Blessing o.t. Cold Gods PM2/6+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets a Ward Save (5+) until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: Bloodstone
item.description: Ward Save (4+) vs attacks with S5 or more

item.name: Borealis
item.description: Range 24", 3 Shots with S4 AP(1), no penalty for multiple shots. If the bearer is on foot it also gains +1M.

item.name: Call of the Pack
item.description: In its own Remaining Moves phase the bearer may summon D2+1 Frost Wolves. The unit may enter the battlefield from any board edge (as if it has left the board in a previous turn due to a pursuit). One use only. Unit is worth 50VP.

item.name: Cavalry Hammer
Cav. Hammer (mounted only)
item.description: two handed weapon, +2S when charging, +1S otherwise

item.name: Chill Wind (6+)
BM Chill Wind
item.description: (6+): MM, Range 24", D6 S4 hits, target unit suffers -1BS until casters next magic phase

item.name: Chosen of the Gods
item.description: PM 2/6+, Blessing of the Cold Gods spell. The spell can only be cast on the bearer or his unit.

item.name: Clan Guard Banner
item.description: The unit ignores 1s for Unruly tests.

item.name: Cloak of Storms
item.description: Ward Save (3+) vs shooting and magic missile attacks. Models on foot only.

item.name: Death Frenzy (7+)
Death Frenzy PM 3/7+
Death Frenzy PM 2/7+
item.description: Augment, Range 18". The unit gains Frenzy. If the unit already has Frenzy, it gains Death Frenzy which works like Frenzy but grants +2A (instead of +1A) and causes D3 Wounds with no saves allowed to this unit at the start of each players close combat phase. The effect of the spell ends when the spell is dispelled/canceled or the unit is defeated in combat. The spell has no effect on character models. Remains in Play.

item.name: Deathblow
item.description: Each model, that has been killed before it could attack in the combat phase, is allowed to make 1 last attack (1A) with all special rules directed at the model that killed it. Cannot be used versus Impact Hits.

item.name: Dispel Scroll
item.description: Automatically dispels one spell without the need of DD. One use only.

item.name: Enchanted Shield
item.description: Shield that grants +2 AS.

item.name: Executioner
item.description: KB

item.name: Expendable
item.description: This unit does not cause panic in friendly units, unless they are Expendable themselves.

item.name: Freeze (8+)
BM Freeze
item.description: (8+): Hex, Range 18", target unit suffers -1T and -1I until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Frost Aura
item.description: Enemy units in base contact with at least one model with this special rule suffers -1 to hit in cc. Only character models with the Frost Aura special rule are allowed to join units with the Frost Aura special rule. Units with Frost Aura are immune to these effects themselves.

item.name: Frost Axe
item.description: no AS

item.name: Frost Blades (7+)
BM Frost Blades
item.description: (7+): Augment, Range 18", cc attacks as well as shooting by this unit gain +1S until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on magic items.

item.name: Frost Burn
item.description: Shield. Models rolling a natural 1 to hit the bearer in cc suffer a S5 hit for each 1 rolled.

item.name: Frost Dragon Head
item.description: Breath Weapon with S3

item.name: Frost Fjord Standard
item.description: The unit gains AP(1) in cc. Has no effect on magic items.

item.name: Frost Giant Hide
item.description: Enemies attacking the bearer in close combat suffer - 1 to their to-hit rolls.

item.name: Frost Pendant
item.description: Ward Save (5+)

item.name: Frost Tusk
item.description: causes D3 wounds

item.name: Great weapons (in exchange for add. handw.)
item.description: +2S, Always strike last, exchange additional hand weapons for Great weapons.

item.name: Great weapons (in exchange for shields)
item.description: +2S, Always strike last, exchange Shields for Great weapons.

item.name: Grendel Shield
item.description: Shield. A model in btb loses 1A, Norse player may choose which model and which attack.

item.name: Harpoon of the Mammoth Hunter
Harpoon of the Mam. Hunter
item.description: Range 16", S6, thrown weapon, causes D3 wounds. The bearer also gains +1M. Models on foot only.

item.name: Horned Helmet
item.description: +1 AS, bearer gains Impact Hits (1)

item.name: Howling of Wolves (5+)
Howling of W. PM2/5+
item.description: Augment, caster and his unit gain +D3" charge range until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Ice Axes
item.description: Counts as additional hand weapons, AP(1)

item.name: Ice Blade of the White Wanderers
Ice Blade of t. W. Wanderers
item.description: A model suffering at least 1 hit from this weapon (in a combat round), has to immediately roll a D6: on a 4+ the magic weapon of the hit model is destroyed.

item.name: Ice Weapon
item.description: Magical attacks

item.name: Lycanthrope
item.description: This model may never be the army general and can only join Werewolf units.

item.name: Mead of Damnation
item.description: Roll a D6 after deployment. Bearer and unit he is with gain: 1 Stupidity, 2-4 Killing Blow, 5-6 Frenzy. Has no effect on mounts or other characters in the unit. After deployment bearer cannot leave or join units. One use only.

item.name: North Storm Pendant
North Storm Pend.
item.description: Activate at the start of any turn. Flying models using their fly movement move at half speed. The effect ends after both players completed a turn. One use only.

item.name: North Wind Banner
item.description: Unit may triple its movement during a march movement.

item.name: Polar Pelt
item.description: +1 AS

item.name: Power Stone
item.description: +2PD to cast a spell. Dice used may exceed maximum allowed by level. One use only.

item.name: Raven Banner of the Great Army
Raven Banner o.t. Great Army
item.description: +D3 CR

item.name: Reaver Banner
item.description: The unit gains the special rule Slavers.

item.name: Relentless
item.description: This unit can march even when an enemy unit is within march blocking range (usually within 8").

item.name: Scrying Bones
item.description: PM 3/3+, Clairvoyance: Target one unit on the board. Your opponent has to reveal any hidden models and magic items (but not which model has them) in that unit.

item.name: Second Sign of Amul (6+)
2nd Sign of Amul PM3/6+
2nd Sign of Amul PM2/6+
item.description: The player gets D3 rerolls. Each reroll can be used to reroll one to-hit roll, to-wound roll, armour save, ward save or regeneration roll. Any rerolls not used at the end of the players turn are wasted.

item.name: Shields (loses Light Cavalry)
item.description: +1AS but loses Light Cavalry rule.

item.name: Slavers
item.description: Roll an additional dice when this unit pursues an enemy and discard the lowest.

item.name: Smite (5+)
Smite PM2/5+
item.description: Each enemy model in btb with the caster suffers a S4 hit.

item.name: Staff of Sorcery
item.description: +1 to total roll to attempt to dispel a spell.

item.name: The Beast Cowers (9+)
BM The Beast Cowers
item.description: Hex, Range 24". Target unit halves its M (including mounts). Flyers have to use their ground movement but do not half their M. Target unit cannot declare a charge or charge even if it would be forced to (e.g. because of Frenzy). Units with Random Movement stop 1" in front of enemy units. Further, the target unit suffers -1 to to-hit rolls in cc. Lasts until the casters next magic phase. The spell has no effect on Infantry (Type Inf).

item.name: The Wolf Hunts (10+)
BM The Wolf Hunts
item.description: (10+): Augment, Range 12". - Choose a point within line of sight of the target unit. The unit then moves up to 2D6" in the direction of that point (use the shortest path; the unit has to wheel and does not have to stop when it reaches the point, i.e. it can continue to move straight ahead). The unit is affected by terrain as normal. If it comes into contact with a unit or impassable terrain the unit stops 1" in front of it. - In addition the unit gets +2M until the casters next magic phase. - Each unit may only benefit from this spell once per magic phase.

item.name: Trample
item.description: At the end of each combat round (timing step 6), in which the model does not count as charging, the model may make a trample special attack against a single unit in btb of unit type Inf, Swa or Cav. The trample special attack causes X hits with a S value equal to the basic S stat of the model. Wounds inflicted count for combat resolution.

item.name: War Banner
item.description: +1 CR

item.name: War Chant
item.description: A unit with this special rule may start the game chanting one of the following anthems: - Anthem of Vengeance: The unit gains Eternal Hatred (The unit hates all enemies and re-rolls all failed to-hit rolls in every cc round). Has no effect on characters. - Anthem of Doom: The unit becomes Immune to Psychology. - Anthem of Furor: The unit causes Fear. - Athem of Mockery: At the start of the enemy turn, the unit may taunt an enemy unit in LOS which is not Immune to Psychology. If the enemy unit would be able to charge the taunting unit (immediately check all requirements incl. charge distance) then the enemy unit has to pass a Ld-test. If the test is failed, the enemy unit has to charge the taunting unit or cannot move voluntarily that turn and the army/unit cannot use any Ld bonuses from character models within that unit (includes general and BSB). Any unit can only be taunted by a single unit each turn. - At the start of every own "Start of the Turn Phase", each unit with this special rule (in any order) may try to intone a new anthem. To do so the unit has to pass a Ld-test, wherein the unit gains +1 if it comprises a musician as well as +1 for each friendly unit within 6" that is chanting (at that moment) the anthem to be intoned. If the test is successful, the unit immediately chants the new anthem and gains the respective special rule. If the test is failed, the unit fails to intone the new anthem and keeps its current anthem if it is already chanting one. - A unit immediately stops its War Chant and loses all respective special rules of the anthem, in the following cases: - The test to intone a new anthem fails with a double 6. - The unit is broken. - The unit suffers from Frenzy (incl. Death Frenzy). - The rank bonus the unit would gain in cc is less than 1 (for whatever reason). - A unit cannot voluntarily stop its War Chant.

item.name: Warhorn
item.description: Bearer and unit may reroll a failed break tests. One use only.

item.name: Warlock Amulet
item.description: Ward Save (5+), MR2.

item.name: Werewolf Banner
item.description: The unit gains Frenzy.

item.name: Werewolf Hide
item.description: Regeneration (5+)

item.name: Wind of Death (9+)
BM Wind of Death
item.description: (9+): MM, Range 24", 2D6 S4 hits

item.name: Winter Breeze (5+)
Winter Breeze PM2/5+
item.description: Each enemy unit in btb with the caster or his unit has to pass a Ld-test. If failed, the respective unit suffers -1 to its to-hit rolls in the next cc phase.

item.name: Wrath of Ulric (5+)
Wrath of Ulric PM2/5+
item.description: Augment, caster and his unit become immune to Fear, Terror and Panic until the casters next magic phase.

rule.name: Norse#8
rule.leftTerm: Great weapons (in exchange for add. handw.)

rule.name: Norse#15
rule.leftTerm: Battle Axe of Jarl Sigurd the Great
